title: Quantum cohomology of blowups
abstract: We prove a decomposition theorem of the quantum cohomology D-module of the blowup of a smooth projective variety X along a smooth subvariety Z. The main tools we use are shift operators and Fourier analysis for equivariant quantum cohomology.
comment: 69 pages, 5 figures, v2: corrected minor errors and added Appendix B, v3: major revision; the main result has been strengthened by eliminating the variables x and y; the initial condition for the decomposition has been clarified; a discussion on the well-definedness of the pullbacks of quantum D-modules has been added
